title: decentrasoft
author: decentrasoft
created_time: May 24, 2022, 09:16:04 AMLast edit: August 14, 2022, 09:14:47 AM by decentrasoft
content: Greetings all,our project is for sale details can be seen https://www.sideprojectors.com/project/27769/pictosi. The project is with guaranteed payments for the next 14 years which are guaranteed with signed contracts which are gonna be provided to the potential buyer and re-signed when the deal is done. It generates monthly income of $9270. All the documentation and resources will be given to the new owner.The project is developed to manage the cases of the Bulgarian private bailiffs. It tracks payments from all of the Bulgarian banks, issue distraints digitally and releases them after payment of the debt, issue all the documents, uses APIs with the Bulgarian institutions to retrieve data for each debtor. It uses digital signatures for everything. It digitally approves and tracks records for payments and connects with all the know accounting software used in Bulgaria.The price can be negotiated and the payment can be done in crypto.Feel free to contact us via DM or by email office@sftdx.com

comments.author: decentrasoft
